languages.text: "Голосочки аж надрываются, слушая, как ты уже переделываешь еще не захваченный корабль. Ох чую, не к добру они так радуются".

traits.locale_text: "Голосочки аж надрываются, слушая, как ты уже переделываешь еще не захваченный корабль. Ох чую, не к добру они так радуются".

languages.text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
languages.original_text: "Голосочки аж надрываются, слушая, как ты уже переделываешь еще не захваченный корабль. Ох чую, не к добру они так радуются".

traits.locale_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
"My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
"My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
"My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
"My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
"My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

languages.text: 「まだ手に入れてもいない船の改装計画を語ってるあなたの声を聞いて、あたいの囁き声が大笑いしてるよ。それと、彼らがそんなに楽しそうにしてるってことは、たぶん…あたいたちにとっては、まったく愉快じゃない何かが待ってるってこと」
languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

traits.locale_text: 「まだ手に入れてもいない船の改装計画を語ってるあなたの声を聞いて、あたいの囁き声が大笑いしてるよ。それと、彼らがそんなに楽しそうにしてるってことは、たぶん…あたいたちにとっては、まったく愉快じゃない何かが待ってるってこと」

languages.text: "Meine Flüsterstimmen lachen sich kaputt, dass Ihr Renovierungspläne für ein Schiff schmiedet, das Ihr noch nicht einmal erobert habt. Ich weiß nicht, was sie so fröhlich macht, aber ich vermute, es wird uns nicht gefallen."
languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Flüsterstimmen lachen sich kaputt, dass Ihr Renovierungspläne für ein Schiff schmiedet, das Ihr noch nicht einmal erobert habt. Ich weiß nicht, was sie so fröhlich macht, aber ich vermute, es wird uns nicht gefallen."

languages.text: « Mes murmures ont éclaté de rire en vous entendant parler de vos projets de rénovation pour un vaisseau que vous n'avez pas encore capturé. Oh, quelque chose me dit qu'on ne va pas du tout aimer ce qui les rend aussi joyeux. »
languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

traits.locale_text: « Mes murmures ont éclaté de rire en vous entendant parler de vos projets de rénovation pour un vaisseau que vous n'avez pas encore capturé. Oh, quelque chose me dit qu'on ne va pas du tout aimer ce qui les rend aussi joyeux. »

languages.text: «Mis susurros ríen a carcajadas escuchando sus planes de renovación para una nave que todavía no hemos capturado siquiera. Ay, algo me dice que el motivo de su alegría no va a gustarnos ni un pelo».
languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

traits.locale_text: «Mis susurros ríen a carcajadas escuchando sus planes de renovación para una nave que todavía no hemos capturado siquiera. Ay, algo me dice que el motivo de su alegría no va a gustarnos ni un pelo».

languages.text: “这艘船还没抢到手，你就已经开始制定整修计划了，那些低语声简直笑开了花。虽然我不知道它们在笑个什么劲儿，但绝对不会是什么好事。”
languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

traits.locale_text: “这艘船还没抢到手，你就已经开始制定整修计划了，那些低语声简直笑开了花。虽然我不知道它们在笑个什么劲儿，但绝对不会是什么好事。”

languages.text: "Fısıltılarım, henüz ele geçiremediğin gemi için yaptığın planlara katıla katıla gülüyor. Neye bu kadar keyiflendiklerini bilmem ama bize yaramayacağı kesin, ondan eminim."
languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."

traits.locale_text: "Fısıltılarım, daha ele geçiremediğin gemi için yaptığın planlara katıla katıla gülüyor. Neye bu kadar keyifleniyorlar, bilmem ama bize yaramayacağı kesin, ondan eminim."

languages.original_text: "My whispers are laughing up a storm listening to you make renovation plans for a ship you haven't captured yet. Oh, something tells me that whatever's made them so happy, we won't like it one bit."
